review_title: Digging and people amazing, work culture race to the bottom
job_title: Field Archaeologist Supervisor in London, England
pros:
- Incredible archaeological discoveries 
- Amazing friendship 
- Great leadership in the field
- Drive time pay
cons:
- Salary
- Little room for growth
- Race to the bottom culture relies on lowest rung employees keeping the work levels up
- Working hours

pros: Friendly and supportive working environment. Room for growth.
cons: Some people may struggle with the work life balance

job_title: Senior Heritage Consultant in Sheffield, England
pros: Great director, lovely colleagues, easy going employer
cons: High workload, limited opportunities to progress, not a varied workload

pros:
